# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory
No copper cable factory has been constructed yet.

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)
- Electricity group (position x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities have no fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills, burner inserters, and boilers have a sufficient fuel supply before use.
### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients for production before use.
### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that steam engines are properly connected to the electricity network before use.
### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are properly plugged into the electric network before use.
### Errors when pipe groups are empty
- Ensure that pipe groups have a sufficient fluid supply before use.
### Errors when belt groups are empty
- Ensure that belt groups have a sufficient item supply before use.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
Important variables that have been assigned include:
* Entity positions (x, y)
* Entity statuses (e.g. EntityStatus.NO_FUEL, EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS)
* Entity types (e.g. burner-mining-drill, stone-furnace, offshore-pump)
